name: Tesla Model S
description: Luxury electric sedan with 405-mile range and 0-60 mph in 1.99s.

name: Tesla Model 3
description: Affordable electric sedan with 358-mile range and autopilot features.

name: Tesla Model X
description: SUV with Falcon Wing doors, 348-mile range, and full self-driving capability.

name: Tesla Model Y
description: Compact electric SUV with 330-mile range and advanced safety features.

name: Tesla Cybertruck
description: Futuristic electric pickup with armored glass and 500-mile range.

name: Tesla Roadster
description: High-performance electric sports car with 620-mile range and 250 mph top speed.

name: Tesla Semi Truck
description: Electric truck with 500-mile range, enhanced autopilot, and low operating costs.

name: Tesla Powerwall
description: Rechargeable home battery for solar energy storage and backup power.

name: Tesla Solar Roof
description: Sleek solar panels integrated into durable roofing tiles for energy efficiency.

name: Tesla Supercharger
description: Fast charging network providing up to 200 miles of range in 15 minutes.

name: Tesla Wall Connector
description: Home charging station for Tesla vehicles with WiFi connectivity.

name: Tesla Autopilot
description: Advanced driver assistance system with full self-driving capabilities.

name: Tesla Full Self-Driving
description: Enhanced autonomous driving software with city and highway navigation.

name: Tesla CCS Adapter
description: Adapter for non-Tesla charging networks, enabling broader charging access.

name: Tesla Model S Plaid
description: Performance variant with tri-motor setup, 1,020 horsepower, and 200 mph top speed.

name: Tesla Model X Plaid
description: High-performance electric SUV with 1,020 horsepower and 0-60 mph in 2.5s.

name: Tesla Home Energy Gateway
description: Smart energy management system for monitoring home energy use.

name: Tesla Solar Inverter
description: Highly efficient inverter designed for Tesla solar panels and Powerwall.

name: Tesla Model 3 Performance
description: High-performance version of Model 3 with 3.1s 0-60 mph and track mode.

name: Tesla Wireless Charger
description: Qi-certified wireless charging pad for mobile devices.
